definition: to think highly of oneself (idiom); giving oneself airs/arrogant and self-important
self/oneself/from/since/naturally/surely
to look at/to regard/to inspect
variant of 什[shen2]
what/very/extremely/any
high/tall/above average/loud/your (honorific)
surname Gao

sentences.english: Sometimes really ambiguous entries make it on the list because I trust my future self way too much.
sentences.chinese: 有時，我寫下含糊不清的條目，這是自視甚高。

sentences.english: No one feels comfortable around a prima do a.
sentences.chinese: 跟自視甚高的人在一起，沒有人會感覺舒服。

sentences.english: She has a high self-esteem, and sees herself as a people person.
sentences.chinese: 她自視甚高，認爲自己擅長與人打交道。

sentences.english: And most of all, I will laugh at myself for man is most comical when he takes himself too seriously.
sentences.chinese: 我笑自己，由於自視甚高的人往往顯得滑稽。

sentences.english: No one feels comfortable around a prima donna.
sentences.chinese: 跟自視甚高的人在一起，沒有人會感覺舒服。

sentences.english: He fancies himself, hoping to get that job.
sentences.chinese: 他自視甚高，竟想得到那份工作。

sentences.english: The haughty man thinks highly of himself while holding others in contempt .
sentences.chinese: 那傲慢的人自視甚高，而藐視別人。

definition: to watch with amusement as sb makes a fool of himself
lit. one body two sides (idiom)/fig. a situation with two sides to it
(of parents) to bring up children for the purpose of being looked after in old age
to fight openly and maneuver covertly (idiom)
not one good point/everything about it is wrong
to persist in one's views
to see, hear and obey (idiom); to take advice/to take sb at his word
to play deaf-mute
to speak without thinking (idiom)/to blurt sth out
lit. the salted fish turns over (idiom)/fig. to experience a reversal of fortune
to have a clear view of things/to adapt to circumstances
vocal accompaniment in some traditional Chinese operas/to speak in support of/to chime in
lit. to play the lute to a cow (idiom)/fig. offering a treat to an unappreciative audience/to cast pearls before swine/caviar to the general/to preach to deaf ears/to talk over sb's head
harmony is to be prized
old school/conservative faction
to disdain as beneath contempt (idiom)
